Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Herpes Simplex Virus Type 2 (HSV-2)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SeraQuest HSV Type 2 Specific IgG ELISA assay for qualitative detection of human IgG antibodies to HSV-2 in serum using ChemWell Automated Analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of human IgG antibodies to HSV-2 in human serum for sexually active individuals and expectant mothers as an aid in presumptive diagnosis of HSV-2 infection; not cleared for blood/plasma donor screening or for immunocompromised, pediatric patients, or matrices other than human serum.
